Description: Industrial Wastewater - Several unauthorized releases of wastewater occurred between Nov. 2018-Sept. 2020, and the company failed to properly maintain equipment to ensure efficient operation.
Info Source: https://www.pca.state.mn.us/sites/default/files/gp2-2021.pdf

Description: Industrial Wastewater - A number of remote sugar beet piling sites were not properly cleaned or maintained after beet piles were moved, allowing untreated runoff to enter waters of the state. Violations occurred in 2013-2014, at the company's Alvarado, Warren, KT, Midway, Glyndon, Perley, and Felton piling sites.
Info Source: https://www.pca.state.mn.us/sites/default/files/gp2-2021.pdf
